name: PacMan: No Cherries!
description:
PACMAN BUT THERE ARE NO CHERRIES!

- Pacman Without Cherries Is Something I Always Wanted To Make.

-But Let Me Tell You Its Not Easy!.

This Is Just An Prototype and the Picture You See Are Of The Game But I Was Using Rtx So I Have To Work On Graphics So All Of My Boiz Out There With Low-end Comps Can Play!.

-Specifications:

-None
